briefTitle: Clinical Trial of Traditional Chinese Diaoshi Jifa Therapy of Meniere's Disease

armGroups.label: experimental group
interventionNames: Other: Diaoshi Jifa therapy plus the Western medical treatment.

interventions.name: Diaoshi Jifa therapy plus the Western medical treatment.
otherNames: Western medical treatment: Ginkgo 20 ml qd iv, Merision 6mg tid po

interventions.name: drug
otherNames: Western medical treatment: Ginkgo 20 ml qd iv, Merision 6mg tid po

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Clinical diagnosis of probable Meniere's disease
2. Must be able to receive manual treatment
3. Dizziness Patients receiving other treatment longer than 5 days before entering the study.

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Patients with critical illness of internal medicine and surgery
2. Patients with spinal disease or other conditions that cannot receive manual treatment.

outcomeMeasures.title: Change in Dizziness Handicap Inventory (DHI) Questionnaire Score
outcomeMeasures.description: dizziness Handicap Inventory (DHI) evaluates the self-perceived handicapping effects imposed by vestibular system disease. We employed the final version of DHI, which contains 25 items including 7 physical questions, 9 functional questions and 9 emotional questions. DHI has a total score of 100 points (4 points for each item). Higher scores indicate more severe handicap. Thus the maximum score for DHI is 100, while the minimum core is 0.
